data.title: Jon Richardson
data.meta_description: Jon Richardson is an English comedian. He is a team captain on 8 Out of 10 Cats and 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown and stars in Dave shows Jon Richardson: Ultimate Worrier and Meet the Richardsons, the last of which also featured his then wife Lucy Beaumont. In 2016, Richardson appeared in...
data.text: Task Description Jon Richardson Episode 1: Fear of failure. (21 June 2016) 1 Prize: Most important document. 2 2 Place these three exercise balls on the yoga mat on the top of that hill. The task is complete when all three balls sit fully inflated and stationary on the mat. 4 3 Get this potato into the golf hole. You may not touch the red green. 5 4 Find out the following information from this Swedish person. The Swedish person may not speak or write in English. 3 5 Live: Pack for your holiday. All items must either be packed in your hand luggage or worn on your body. 4 Total 18 Episode 2: Pork is a sausage. (28 June 2016) 1 Prize: Trendiest item of clothing. 3 2 Eat me (an egg). Fastest wins. 3 3 Make the best music video for a nursery rhyme. 5 4 Using this camera, take a picture of an inanimate object that looks like you. 4 5 Order the following pizza for the Taskmaster: Extra large vegetarian pizza with pepperoni and bacon, and without tomato and cheese. You may not use the following words: EXTRA, LARGE, VEGETARIAN, PIZZA, PEPPERONI, BACON, TOMATO, CHEESE 5 Bonus: Make the pizza person say the word "bubbles". 0 6 Live: Using these big chopsticks, get these potatoes into your basket. You must only hold the big chopsticks on the grips provided. The big chopsticks alone may touch the potatoes in turn. Whoever has the most potatoes. 5 Total 25 Episode 3: A pistachio eclair. (5 July 2016) 1 Prize: Best dinner party guest. 1 2 Impress this mayor. 1 3 Make the most unexpected silhouette on this screen. 5 4 Buy a gift for the Taskmaster. 1 5 Team: Retrieve a potato between various teammates who between them cannot see, hear or speak. 5 6 Live: Throw the rabbits into your hat. 4 Total 17 Episode 4: Welcome to Rico Face. (12 July 2016) 1 Prize: Coolest blue thing. 5 2 Rescue the cat. 2 3 Conceal this pineapple on your person. No part of the pineapple may be thrown away. 5 4 Guess who set you each task. 4 5 Team: Using only the items on the rug, construct the best thing for the Taskmaster. 1 6 Live: Create the highest tower using only these potato-based items. Your potato tower must be self-standing. Your potato tower must be built on the table. Your potato tower will be measured from the tabletop to the highest potato point. 0 Total 17 Episode 5: There's strength in arches. (19 July 2016) 1 Prize: Best piece of memorabilia. 3 2 Get all this shopping into the shopping trolley. DQ 4 Make a bridge over the river using only items on this table. Highest self-supporting bridge wins. The bridge alone must support the potato. You must not touch the Taskmaster's house. 5 Total 13
